price: ߍ߲߬ߍ߲߫ ( ߏ߬ ߡߊ߫ ߞߍ߫ )߸ ߊ߰ ߡߍ߲ ߝߐ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߊ߲ ߘߌߣߵߏ߬ ߛߓߍ߫ ߗߐ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߣߴߊ߲ ߘߌߣߊ߬ ߖߊ߲߰ߞߕߊ ߘߐߝߎߟߋ߲߫ ߊ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߝߋ߲ߜߋ߲߫
arabic: كَلَّاۚ سَنَكۡتُبُ مَا يَقُولُ وَنَمُدُّ لَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ مَدّٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: kallā sanaktubu mā yaqūlu wanamuddu lahu mina al-ʿadhābi maddan
